feed.title: Lunalytics Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Lunalytics: 0.9.7
entry.content:
New Features

  • Adds support for ping monitoring type (https://github.com/KSJaay/Lunalytics/pull/111)
  • Adds support for JSON Query monitoring type (https://github.com/KSJaay/Lunalytics/pull/117)

Bug Fixes

  • Negative ChatID is now allowed for telegram (https://github.com/KSJaay/Lunalytics/pull/113)
  • Escape telegram message for Markdown (https://github.com/KSJaay/Lunalytics/pull/116)

entry.title: New release for Lunalytics: 0.9.9 - Fixes issues with incident messages
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 0.9.9 - Fixes issues with incident message updates not working (Commit: https://github.com/KSJaay/Lunalytics/commit/c3fa21b94c7093776ebe270483657bf70b14b21f)
  • 0.9.8 - Adds new useFetch hook to utilise Loading screen (PR: https://github.com/KSJaay/Lunalytics/pull/118)

entry.title: New release for Lunalytics: 0.9.10 - Fixes various bugs with monitors, and status pages
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • 0.9.10 - Bug fixes with monitors, caching and status pages (https://github.com/KSJaay/Lunalytics/pull/129)
